resources.string: V kolikor se vam naša aplikacija zdi uporabna, bi bili veseli, če ju ocenite. Hvala za podporo!

To see your location on the map, give Vrijeme na Radaru access to your location.
 
 If you use the home screen widget, give Vrijeme na Radaru access to your location all the time. That way the widget can stay up to date even when the app is not in use.
 
 The location data stays on your device and the app uses it for no other purpose than to show the red location dot on the map.

We noticed you are using a Vrijeme na Radaru widget on your home screen. Consider giving Vrijeme na Radaru access to your location all the time so the widget can stay up to date even when the app is not in use.\n \n The location data stays on your device and the app uses it for no other purpose than to show the red location dot on the map.

Z dotikom posamezne animacije se ta prikaže na celotnem zaslonu. Z dotikom iskalnega drsnika se prevzame nadzor nad prikazovanjem slik animacije. 
 
Za hiter dostop do trenutnega stanja radarja postavitvite widget aplikacije na začetni zaslon. 
 
Aplikacijo odprete z dotikom widgeta. 
 
Aplikacija s posamezne radarske slike s pomočjo OCR prebere čas izdelave posnetka, ga pretvori v vaš časovni pas in prikaže nad sliko. Kadar spletni servisi radarskih slik ne osvežujejo, boste opazili, da starost animacije narašča. Če bi starost slike presegla 1 uro, se starost izpiše v rdeči barvi.
